Title: Removes the requirement that a public employer continue terms of an expired agreement until a new agreement is negotiated with an employee organization
Summary: Removes the requirement that a public employer continue terms of an expired agreement until a new agreement is negotiated with an employee organization.
LawCode: Amd ยง209-a, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to removing the requirement that a public employer continue terms of an expired agreement until a new agreement is negotiated with an employee organization
